document_data.name: Atrion
document_data.mainbody: '''Atrion''' was a member of the [[Freedom Riders]] under the command of [[Randal Morn]] in [[Shadowdale]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
Around the year [[1369 DR]], Randal, Atrion, and some other Freedom Riders led an expedition into [[Shraevyn's Tomb]]. Following an initial battle with the [[Zhentarim]], the entire group was either captured, or killed and turned into [[undead]] by the [[shadow]] [[Gothyl]], save for Atrion. He managed to escape the chaos of the battle and return to [[Shadowdale (town)|Shadowdale]].

After he carried himself back to town, Atrion sought out the great [[wizard]] and [[sage]] [[Elminster]], at [[Elminster's tower|his tower]]. He found the scribe [[Lhaeo]] but managed to convince him to form a rescue party for the commander and resistance leader.
